1/ I want to make it clear for everyone since I'm being attacked over this constantly.  I've never called the Polygon PoS chain a layer 2 scaling solution and I've explained to people numerous times that it's a sidechain/separate layer 1.

That's fine and I get that - but just because I'm associated with Polygon doesn't mean that I condone everything that they do.  Banteg is implying that I called the PoS chain a layer 2 when I never have - that is just spreading lies.

I've never called the PoS chain an L2 and I've constantly explained to people that it's a sidechain/separate blockchain (layer 1).  This is why I find it really weird that I get attacked over my affiliation with Polygon - I stick to the truth but apparently that doesn't matter?

I didn't deny having a financial interest - I've disclosed it many times before - I was just adding some extra colour.  I don't think banteg meant it as a joke given his hostility towards Polygon over the last few months.
